mapper.select: SELECT T2.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T2.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , T1.CNTR_CST_NO /*계약고객번호*/ , T2.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형*/ , T1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM /*확정일시*/ , T2.BASE_PD_CD /* 상품코드 */ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1/*계약기본*/ JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND T2.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T2.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T2.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd} AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT CNTR_TP_CD FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo}) = '03' THEN '70160' ELSE CASE WHEN T2.OG_TP_CD IN ('HR1','W06') THEN T2.RVE_CD ELSE T3.RVE_CD END END AS RVE_CD FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M T1 --(공통)사용자계정기본T INNER JOIN T_CMY_USR_M T2 --(공통)사용자기본T ON T2.USR_ID = T1.USR_ID AND T2.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' -- 예시 : 'TNT_EDU' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 ON T3.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T3.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID AND BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') /* 당월 기준 */ WHERE 1=1 AND T1.EPNO = #{prtnrNo} AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') <= (SELECT MIN(A2.BASE_D) FROM TB_SVPD_SV_CLND_BAS A2 WHERE A2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND NVL(A2.DF_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' AND NVL(A2.PHLD_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' AND A2.BASE_Y = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND A2.BASE_MM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND A2.DOW_DV_CD NOT IN ('1', '7') ) THEN (SELECT A2.BASE_Y || A2.BASE_MM || MAX(A2.BASE_D) FROM TB_SVPD_SV_CLND_BAS A2 WHERE A2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND NVL(A2.DF_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' AND NVL(A2.PHLD_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' AND A2.DOW_DV_CD NOT IN ('1', '7') AND A2.BASE_Y = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'YYYY') AND A2.BASE_MM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'MM') GROUP BY A2.BASE_Y, A2.BASE_MM ) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') END FROM DUAL

SELECT CNTRB.SELL_PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , CNTRB.SELL_OG_TP_CD AS OG_TP_CD /*조직유형코드*/ , PRTNB.OG_ID AS OG_ID /*조직ID*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS CNTRB INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS PRTNB ON CNTRB.SELL_OG_TP_CD = PRTNB.OG_TP_CD AND CNTRB.SELL_PRTNR_NO = PRTNB.PRTNR_NO WHERE CNTRB.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTRB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PRTNB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
